title: Rapper Kodak Black arrested on trespassing charge in Florida
text:
Rapper Kodak Black was arrested on a trespassing charge Saturday in South Florida, authorities said.

The Broward Sheriff‚Äôs Office said Black was taken into custody in his hometown of Pompano Beach early Saturday morning, according to the South Florida SunSentinel. Investigators did not immediately release details about what prompted the arrest.

RAPPER KODAK BLACK HANDS OUT 5,000 TURKEYS TO SOUTH FLORIDA FAMILIES WHILE SERVING REHAB STINT

Black, whose legal name is Bill Kapri, later posted bond and was released, the newspaper reported. Neither his publicist nor his attorney immediately returned an emailed request for comment.

Black had a three-year federal prison sentence for falsifying documents used to buy weapons at a Miami gun store commuted by President Donald Trump on his last day in office in 2020. He had served about half his sentence.

He was later sentenced to probation last April for assaulting a teenage girl in a South Carolina hotel room. Black was originally charged with rape, but accepted a deal and pleaded guilty to first-degree assault.

CLICK HERE TO GET THE FOX NEWS APP

Black has sold over 30 million singles and has had several multiplatinum and platinum-certified singles, including "Zeze," "No Flockin‚Äô" and "Roll in Peace."

title: Miley Cyrus Skillfully Avoids A Wardrobe Malfunction During Her New Year's Eve Performance
text:
Miley Cyrus ringed New Year 2022 as she patterned with Pete Davidson for NBC's Miley's New Year's Eve Party on Friday, December 31. As the singer was performing on the stage her stop fell off but Milet skillfully avoided the wardrobe malfunction and continued singing. The singer, who was hosting the live New Year's Eve party was also joined by her sister Noah Cyrus and singer Saweetie.

Miley Cyrus avoids wardrobe malfunction at New Year's Eve party

Miley Cyrus skilfully avoided a wardrobe malfunction while she was hosting Miley's New Year's Eve Party with Pete Davidson on NBC Friday night. The singer had just started singing Party In The USA when her top fell off, the singer quickly turned her back from the camera and audience and put on a red blazer as she continued her performance. As she continued the singer joked and changed her lyrics to, "Everybody's definitely looking at me now."

We know its Miley when she loses her top on Live. #MileysNewYearsEveParty pic.twitter.com/c4t3ewkVUc ‚Äî Miley Central (@MileyCentraI) January 1, 2022

Screw CNN, Miley, Pete Davidson and Brandi Carlile killed it tonight #MileysNewYearsEveParty pic.twitter.com/v4SvByVcPz ‚Äî Walter Crankykite (@crankykite) January 1, 2022

As per Insider, as the show ended Miley wished all the viewers and said, "That resilience shouldn't end here. Let's bring that into the new year with us. We've all learned how to expect the unexpected, and rather than see it as a problem, let's see it as an opportunity. I wish everyone here in Miami and everyone watching from home a happy and healthy 2022."

Miley Cyrus makes it to Forbes‚Äô under 30 list

On December 1, 2021, Forbes took to their official Twitter handle and announced the names of Forbes under 30 Class of 2022. Miley Cyrus made it to the list and shared her reaction as she wrote, "FORBES 30 UNDER 30. I turned 29 last week. It was now or never. Thank you for the honour. @Forbes @happyhippiefdn @gucci." She also shared a being the scene video of her shoot, in the video she could be heard saying, "Songwriting is the greatest joy that I have in my life. It‚Äôs my favourite element of what I do. Taking it in and being grateful every day for the fact that I write songs for a living because a lot of people write songs and it doesn‚Äôt get to be what keeps their lights on and for me to be able to be one of those people, I never forget how lucky I am," she said."

FORBES 30 UNDER 30.



I turned 29 last week. It was now or never. Thank you for the honor. @Forbes @happyhippiefdn @gucci pic.twitter.com/tPbtDXbSpF ‚Äî Miley Ray Cyrus (@MileyCyrus) November 30, 2021

title: Alfred Molina Reveals How Doc Ock Was Different In 'No Way Home' Compared To 'Spider-Man 2
text:
After a long wait and putting end to several speculations, Spider-Man: No Way Home got released globally last week and has been declared as the world's number one movie currently. The movie brought back some of the fans' favourite characters from the previous Spider-Man outings like Green Goblin, Doc Ock, Electro and many more. Alfred Molina, who essays the role of Doctor Otto Octavius / Doctor Octopus, recently opened up his return to the franchise and compared how Doc Ock has changed in No Way Home compared to 2004's Spider-Man 2.

Alfred Molina Compares Spider-Man 2 and Spider-Man: No Way Home's Doc Ock

As per ScreenRant, during a behind-the-scenes deep-dive with Sony, Alfred Molina opened up about his return to Spider-Man: No Way Home and shared how his character had changed since the 2004 movie Spider-Man 2002. He said, "What I thought was so wonderful about [Spider-Man 2], the first time, was they gave Doc Ock this wonderful redemptive moment. And like all great villains, like a lot of villains in the Marvel universe, he‚Äôs become a villain kind of reluctantly ‚Äî or almost by accident."

He added, "I knew that when Jon Watts described what‚Äôs going to be Doc Ock‚Äôs first appearance in this film, he just knows it‚Äôs going to be a moment of jaw-dropping awe. I wanted to make sure that I was in the right place in terms of the performance, so it was useful to go back and look at [Spider-Man 2]. But at the same time, it‚Äôs a different director, it‚Äôs a different movie, there‚Äôs a freshness to it, so I didn‚Äôt want to just come back and replicate what we‚Äôd done before. It was important to me to arrive as if this were the first time."

No Way Home also saw the return of previous Spider-Man actors Tobey Maguire and Andrew Garfield as they helped Tom Holland's web-slinger, and for the first time ever all three Spider-Man's were seen on the big screen together. The return of Maguire and Garfield was the subject of speculation, and Sony, Marvel and the cast attempted to conceal their involvement, despite numerous leaks. The film also features Zendaya, Benedict Cumberbatch, Jacob Batalon, Jon Favreau, Jamie Foxx, Willem Dafoe, Alfred Molina, Benedict Wong, Tony Revolori and Marisa Tomei.

Image: Instagram/@spidermanmovie/Twitter/@Asaylum117

title: 'Devon Ke Dev Mahadev' Fame Actor Mohit Raina Announces Marriage by Sharing Wedding Pics

title: Stevie Nicks Supported Christine McVie‚Äôs Exit From Fleetwood Mac: ‚ÄòPack Your Bags and Go Home‚Äô
text:
After decades of performing with the band, one of Fleetwood Mac‚Äôs two female members, Christine McVie, decided to retire. Though she eventually returned after a 16-year hiatus, her exit initially seemed permanent. Her bandmate and close friend Stevie Nicks explained that she was completely supportive of McVie‚Äôs decision, even though she was relieved when the lengthy hiatus ended.

Christine McVie and Stevie Nicks | Aaron Rapoport/Corbis/Getty Images

Stevie Nicks and Christine McVie became close friends while in Fleetwood Mac

After McVie helped welcome Nicks into Fleetwood Mac, the two became fast friends. They stuck together, particularly when the band dynamic soured after both woman‚Äôs breakups. They helped each other navigate the primarily male-dominated world of rock and roll.

https://twitter.com/ThatEricAlper/status/1314543689830629376

‚ÄúChristine [McVie] and I were a force of nature,‚Äù Nicks told NME. ‚ÄúIn the first two months I was in the band, Chris and I made a pact that we would never be in a room full of famous English or American guitar players and be treated like second class citizens.‚Äù

According to Harper‚Äôs Bazaar, Nicks is grateful for McVie, referring to her as a ‚Äúmentor, sister, and best friend.‚Äù

Nicks fully supported McVie‚Äôs exit from the band

Given the closeness of their relationship, it was difficult for Nicks when McVie chose to exit the band in 1998. She had been dealing with anxiety related to flying, something that made international tours nearly impossible. Because of this, she chose to retire and move home to England. Nicks was supportive of this decision.

‚ÄúI understood why,‚Äù she told Vulture. ‚ÄúI understood that in her heart of hearts, she could not do it anymore. There were reasons ‚Ä¶ she was having panic attacks. She was getting to be afraid to fly. There‚Äôs nothing worse than being afraid to fly. I understood that she needed to go home.‚Äù

Nicks said that she personally gave McVie her blessing to leave the band.

‚ÄúI love Chris, and she was my best friend for 30 years,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúSo when your best friend looks at you, in your eyes, and says, ‚ÄòI can‚Äôt do this anymore,‚Äô you just have to let her go. And I did. I said, ‚ÄòChristine, pack your bags and go home. We‚Äôll be fine. It‚Äôs not your responsibility to stay in this band for the rest of your life. It‚Äôs your responsibility to be true to yourself. You‚Äôve done a great job. You‚Äôve been in a band with Mick [Fleetwood] and John [McVie] for five years before Lindsey [Buckingham] and I even came along. So you‚Äôve paid your dues. Go home.‚Äô‚Äù

Stevie Nicks was thrilled when Christine McVie rejoined Fleetwood Mac

Though Nicks gave her wholehearted blessing for McVie to leave, she said she was relieved when McVie returned after 16 years.

.‚Å¶@fleetwoodmac‚Å© closes ‚Å¶@WellsFargoCtr‚Å© show with Stevie Nicks and Christine McVie singing deep cut ‚ÄúAll Over Again‚Äù Watch for Review ‚Å¶@mcall‚Å© pic.twitter.com/Q26miwGHvS ‚Äî John J. Moser (@JohnJMoser) March 23, 2019

‚ÄúWhen we went on the road, I realized what an amazing friend she‚Äôd been of mine that I had lost and didn‚Äôt realize the whole consequences of it till now,‚Äù Nicks told the Star Tribune. ‚ÄúShe brings the funny back into Fleetwood Mac. Before, it was just a boys‚Äô club. With her back, there‚Äôs more of a feminine touch to the whole thing. I never want her to ever go out of my life again, and that has nothing to do with music and everything to do with her and I as friends.‚Äù

title: ‚ÄòBelow Deck Med‚Äô: Bobby Giancola Recalls ‚Äòthe Absolute Worst‚Äô New Year‚Äôs Eve Ever (Exclusive)
text:
Many Below Deck yachties typically work over the holidays, which often includes New Year‚Äôs Eve. Former Below Deck Mediterranean deckhand Bobby Giancola recalled one season on a boat which became his worst New Year‚Äôs Eve memory ever.

He told Showbiz Cheat Sheet that many crews stick with the same captain. So when a new captain takes over a vessel most of the crew will leave ‚Äì or the captain makes life miserable enough that remaining crew members become ‚Äúinspired‚Äù to leave. Unfortunately for Giancola, he spent New Year‚Äôs Eve dealing with a captain who wanted him to quit.

Bobby Giancola‚Äôs worst New Year‚Äôs Eve memory was on a yacht

Giancola said he‚Äôs had some ‚Äúhorrible‚Äù New Year‚Äôs but the experience on that boat was definitely the very worst. ‚ÄúI mean, probably like the first thing I can think of my worst New Year‚Äôs was I was working on a boat,‚Äù he recalled.

Captain Sandy Yawn, Hannah Ferrier, Adam Glick, Bugsy Drake, Lauren Cohen, Malia White, Max Hagley, Bobby Giancola, Wes Walton from Below Deck Med speak with a charter guest |Virginia Sherwood/Bravo/ NBCU Photo Bank

‚ÄúAnd, long story short, the captain and I did not get along,‚Äù Giancola continued. ‚ÄúHe was a new captain. My captain had quit to do another program, which eventually I followed him to that boat. But a lot of the time in yachting when a new captain comes on board with all the original crew, he cleans house or makes it to where everybody quits. And then he brings in his people, and that‚Äôs kind of what happened.‚Äù

‚ÄúLike he didn‚Äôt talk to me,‚Äù he added. ‚ÄúWhen I would try to talk to him. He didn‚Äôt talk back. And all he would talk about is how amazing his last first mate was and how he did everything. And so it just made the New Year‚Äôs just awful.‚Äù

Colin Macy-O‚ÄôToole said New Year‚Äôs Eve is his least favorite holiday

While Colin Macy-O‚ÄôToole from Below Deck Med can‚Äôt point to a specific time when New Year‚Äôs Eve was a bust, he said he‚Äôs just not a big fan of the holiday. ‚ÄúNew Year‚Äôs is my number one, least favorite holiday of the year,‚Äù he told Showbiz Cheat Sheet. ‚ÄúYou know, you just feel like there‚Äôs so much pressure like making plans. It‚Äôs so annoying, like ‚ÄòShe‚Äôs doing this and he‚Äôs doing that, like, what am I doing?‚Äô You know?‚Äù

He‚Äôs also at a different point in his life where most of his friends are married or have kids. ‚ÄúSo yeah, now that everyone has kids now, it‚Äôs like, I go to my buddy‚Äôs house, you know, a couple of blocks over,‚Äù he shared. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôll have a couple of drinks and then at 12:05 I‚Äôm out of there.‚Äù

Did Bobby and Colin make New Year‚Äôs resolutions?

Macy-O‚ÄôToole also isn‚Äôt a big fan of making a New Year‚Äôs resolution either. ‚ÄúHopefully 2022 is a good successful year for everybody, and especially with all the s*** that we‚Äôre all going through,‚Äù he remarked. ‚ÄúAnd it‚Äôs just, you know, it‚Äôs just one of those things of wanting normalcy again. I just hope everyone can stay healthy and kind of get back to normal.‚Äù

While Giancola agreed with Macy-O‚ÄôToole, he also strives for more of a work/life balance in 2022. ‚ÄúI‚Äôm going to do my best to get back in the gym, I know that‚Äôs such a cliche New Year‚Äôs resolution but it‚Äôs been years since I‚Äôve been in the gym,‚Äù he remarked.

‚ÄúAnd now things that have heated up with being a yacht broker,‚Äù Giancola added. ‚ÄúAnd I‚Äôm able to breathe a little bit now and kind of pull back the reins a little bit with work. Because you got to have balance. And so I guess I would say in a vague term is just more balance between work and life.‚Äù

title: ‚ÄòRHOC‚Äô: Vicki Gunvalson and Steve Lodge‚Äôs Relationship Crumbled During ‚ÄòRHUGT‚Äô ‚Äì and She Hates Dating
text:
Vicki Gunvalson from The Real Housewives of Orange County faced the dissolution of her relationship with Steve Lodge while she filmed The Real Housewives Ultimate Girls Trip.

Friends Tamra Judge from RHOC and Dorinda Medley from The Real Housewives of New York City recently discussed their experience on RHUGT and shared that Gunvalson had to deal with being filmed while at the same time enduring a breakup. Medley said watching it happen was difficult and Judge said while Gunvalson has started dating, she isn‚Äôt loving it.

Did Dorinda Medley have tough love for Vicki Gunvalson during ‚ÄòRHUGT‚Äô?

Medley‚Äôs Blue Stone Manor was the setting for the second season of RHUGT and she said the overall experience was interesting. She then hinted at having a moment with Gunvalson about her breakup with Lodge that may have been a little tough for Gunvalson to hear.

Steve Lodge and Vicki Gunvalson from The Real Housewives of Orange County have a conversation | Phillip Faraone/Bravo/NBCU Photo Bank

‚ÄúAfter all that stuff happened with Vicki and Steve, we kind of saw it happening while we were there,‚Äù she said on the Two T‚Äôs in a Pod podcast. ‚ÄúThat was tough.‚Äù

Judge then said that Medley ‚Äúkind of nailed it,‚Äù hinting that Medley said something very direct to Gunvalson.

‚ÄúYeah, but that didn‚Äôt make me feel good,‚Äù Medley replied. ‚ÄúBut I was like, you know, you got the old thing. I tell it like it is, but I always make it nice. I told it like it was but didn‚Äôt make it nice. But I could see the writing on the wall.‚Äù

Vicki Gunvalson wanted to leave Blue Stone Manor during filming?

A source told US Weekly that Gunvalson was distraught during RHUGT Season 2 filming because she and Lodge had broken up. ‚ÄúSteve broke up with Vicki while she was filming the [Real Housewives] spinoff show in the Berkshires,‚Äù the source said. ‚ÄúAfter he told her this, she was traumatized. It ruined her. She didn‚Äôt want to be at the [Dorinda Medley‚Äôs] house anymore.‚Äù

‚ÄúShe‚Äôs in terrible shape. She still loves him,‚Äù the source added. ‚ÄúThey had not been getting along for a long time. He seemed disinterested in her for a very long time.‚Äù

Gunvalson recently reflected on how her split from Lodge seemed very similar to Lala Kent from Vanderpump Rules and Randall Emmett‚Äôs breakup. Kent recalled how Emmett spoiled her at first and recalled how much she loved him on the Not Skinny but Not Fat podcast. But now Kent can‚Äôt remember much of the relationship except for the heartbreak. ‚ÄúSounds very similar to the man who stole almost 6 years of my life that I will never get back. So hurtful, so wrong,‚Äù Gunvalson wrote on the podcast Instagram.

Tamra Judge from ‚ÄòRHOC‚Äô says Vicki Gunvalson is dating (but hates it)

Medley asked Judge if Gunvalson was dating. Judge said she was, but it wasn‚Äôt going very well. ‚ÄúI think she‚Äôs starting to date,‚Äù Judge said. ‚ÄúYeah, she‚Äôs trying it.‚Äù

https://twitter.com/tamrajudgeOC/status/1461346688266752012

Judge then recounted a recent date Gunvalson went on where she suddenly tried to FaceTime Judge in the middle of it. ‚ÄúShe calls me. She hates it,‚Äù she said. Judge added, ‚ÄúShe texted me the other night or FaceTimed me, I‚Äôm sick as a dog. And she‚Äôs like, pick up your FaceTime! I said no I‚Äôm dying! So I turn all the lights off. Accepted it and it‚Äôs some guy she‚Äôs with on a date who‚Äôs very nice. [But] I told her to screen these guys, you‚Äôre dating radar is horrible, horrible!‚Äù

title: ‚ÄòSister Wives‚Äô: Kody Brown Reiterates That He Has No Romantic Relationship With Meri Brown
text:
Kody Brown really wants Sister Wives fans to understand that he and his first wife, Meri Brown, have absolutely no romantic relationship. On the Dec. 26 episode, Kody reminded fans that his housing rotation, pre-pandemic, did not include time spent at Meri‚Äôs home. While he insisted his rotation was fair and equitable, fans who have followed the Brown family for the last decade aren‚Äôt buying it.

Kody Brown and Meri Brown admitted to having no romantic relationship last year

The trouble between Kody and Meri Brown is nothing new. When fans first met the couple in 2010, things seemed to be going well. In 2015, the relationship went awry after Kody legally divorced Meri to marry his fourth wife, Robyn Brown. Shortly after the divorce, Meri was caught in a catfishing scandal. The catfishing scandal appeared to be the final blow for the couple‚Äôs romantic relationship. Things have been icy between them since.

Christine Brown, Janelle Brown, Kody Brown, Robyn Brown, and Meri Brown ‚ÄòSister Wives‚Äô | TLC

During season 15 of Sister Wives, Meri and Kody got real about their relationship. In a series of interviews, the couple admitted to being mostly estranged. They both revealed that they have absolutely no romantic relationship, and Kody certainly doesn‚Äôt seem keen on changing that. Meri, for some reason, continues to hold out hope that the romance will return.

Kody Brown explained his pre-pandemic housing rotation

On the Dec. 26 episode of Sister Wives, Kody sat down for an interview and discussed how he divided his time before the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic set in. Kody explained that he would spend two days with three of his four wives. He said he would spend two days with Janelle Brown, then two days with Robyn Brown, followed by two days with Christine Brown. The schedule would then repeat unless a special event came up.

Kody Brown ‚ÄòSister Wives‚Äô | TLC

Kody made it a point to say that Meri was not part of the rotation because he did not spend evenings at her home. He emphasized that he and Meri are strictly friends. While the statement felt like a low blow to Sister Wives fans, it‚Äôs not new information. Both Kody and Meri have made it clear that there is no intimacy in their relationship.

Fans think Kody is spending all of his time with his fourth wife

Kody insists that his pre-pandemic schedule was fair and equitable, but fans aren‚Äôt exactly buying it. While it‚Äôs clear he has spent all of his time with Robyn since the start of the pandemic, fans think he has spent the majority of his time with Robyn before that, too. In fact, it has been rumored that Kody has only been spending time with Robyn since the family‚Äôs move to Flagstaff, Arizona, in 2018.

Robyn Brown and Kody Brown, ‚ÄòSister Wives‚Äô | TLC

If Kody was telling the truth, things have changed significantly now. Robyn is receiving even more attention now that one of the three wives she was allegedly splitting time with has left the state. In November 2021, Christine announced her separation from Kody. She has since moved to Utah to be closer to her children. While Meri remains in Arizona, technically, Sister Wives fans are certain that she is spending the majority of her time in Utah, too.

title: Hailey Bieber Got a New Tattoo in the 1 Place She Told Justin Bieber Not to Put More Ink
text:
Hailey Bieber Got a New Tattoo in the 1 Place She Told Justin Bieber Not to Put More Ink

Hailey Bieber has a new tattoo, and fans are wondering what Justin Beiber thinks about it. It‚Äôs not the design Hailey Bieber got so much as the placement of her new ink that has fans curious. Here‚Äôs a look at Bieber‚Äôs tattoo and how it‚Äôs connected to her famous husband.

Justin Bieber and Hailey Bieber | Jean Baptiste Lacroix/FilmMagic

Hailey Bieber recently got a new neck tattoo

Famous tattoo artist Doctor Woo recently showed off some ink he gave Hailey Bieber. Doctor Woo has tattooed celebrities like Drake, Miley Cyrus, and Zoe Kravitz.

On Dec. 19, he shared an Instagram post containing a photo of a tattoo he did on Bieber‚Äôs neck. Her hair was pulled back to reveal the fresh ink, and she wore a face mask. Her earring, adorned with a jewel-encrusted letter B, is also visible in the image.

The 25-year-old got the words ‚Äúnew york‚Äù in delicate handwriting just behind her right ear and below an old tattoo of a tiny diamond.

Doctor Woo captioned the photo, ‚ÄúLil NY üçé love ‚úçüèº on Hailey awhile back #hideawayatsuitex #slimneedle.‚Äù

Justin Bieber previously revealed that Hailey Bieber told him not to get any more neck tattoos

The location of Bieber‚Äôs new ink is surprising since her husband, Justin Bieber, previously shared that she asked him not to get any more tattoos on his neck.

In his 2020 YouTube documentary series ‚ÄúJustin Bieber: Next Chapter,‚Äù the 27-year-old musician showed off some of his ink. He pointed out a large rose tattoo he has on his neck.

‚ÄúI think I‚Äôm done on my neck,‚Äù Bieber said (via PopCrush). ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs a Hailey request.‚Äù

The ‚ÄúSorry‚Äù singer also revealed that he is saving space on a certain body part for future tattoos. He plans to have children someday, and he said he might get portraits of them on his back.

Justin Bieber and Hailey Bieber | Axelle/Bauer-Griffin/FilmMagic

Both members of the famous couple are covered in ink

Both of the Biebers already have several tattoos, and Justin, in particular, is practically covered in ink.

Body Art Guru says that the ‚ÄúStay‚Äù singer has at least 60 tattoos on his body. He has a large owl on his left forearm, a tiger on his left bicep, and the words ‚ÄúBetter At 70‚Äù on his thigh. Bieber has a jester on his right arm, his mother‚Äôs eye in the crease of his left elbow, and a treble clef behind his left ear.

He also has what appears to be a portrait of his famous ex-girlfriend Selena Gomez as an angel on his left forearm.

While not as tattooed as her husband, Hailey Bieber also has her fair share of body art. According to Body Art Guru, the model has at least 25 small tattoos.

She has her parents‚Äô wedding date (June 10, 1990) in Roman numerals on her left wrist. She also has a tiny gun inked on the inside of the middle finger of her left hand and a little heart on her left ankle.

title: Rose Bowl returns to Pasadena
text:
PASADENA, Calif. ‚Äî The Rose Bowl made a triumphant return to Pasadena on Saturday for an exciting showdown between Ohio State and Utah.

A sea of red swarmed outside the stadium before the game, as fans were fired up.

Former Utah football player Jeff Battcher flew from Macon, Georgia to tailgate.

‚ÄúIt‚Äôs the granddaddy of them all,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs no doubt this is the biggest event in any football player‚Äôs career to play here. I would have given anything to play here.‚Äù

Ohio State supporter Tom Murnane made a quick trip from Agoura Hills to see the sporting spectacle.

‚ÄúBig Buckeye fan, so we go back to Columbus for all the home games,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúToday all we had to do was drive across town for this one, so it‚Äôs great.‚Äù

After a dramatic surge in COVID-19 cases canceled five other bowl games, some weren‚Äôt sure if the Rose Bowl would take place.

‚ÄúI thought that this game could be canceled,‚Äù Battcher said. ‚ÄúBut I was coming regardless, to be with my friends.‚Äù

‚ÄúWe were very concerned,‚Äù Murnane said. ‚ÄúEven two hours before kickoff, we‚Äôre still crossing our fingers and hoping to play.‚Äù

Utah‚Äôs fans filled up the stands, taking up more than three-quarters of the Rose Bowl seats.

‚ÄúThis is like a home game for us, you should see all the fans that are here,‚Äù Battcher said. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre going to dominate in the stands and on the field today.‚Äù

Yet the Buckeye faithful weren‚Äôt intimidated, as their squad made its 16th Rose Bowl appearance.

‚ÄúI‚Äôm not nervous at all, we‚Äôve been here a lot,‚Äù Ohio State fan Jack Doyle said. ‚ÄúI think it‚Äôs going to be an easy win, it won‚Äôt be a war but I think it‚Äôll go well.‚Äù

No matter what side you were rooting for, it was all about ringing in 2022 with an American tradition.

‚ÄúYou don‚Äôt do anything on News Years Day except watch football all day long,‚Äù Utah fan Maddie Peters said. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs just the way it is and we love it.‚Äù

When it was all said and done, Ohio State defeated Utah 48-45 in a high-scoring shootout.

title: General Hospital Spoilers: Lulu Spencer Comes Out of Coma ‚Äì Tracy‚Äôs Shocking News Stirs Granddaughter Awake?
text:
General Hospital (GH) spoilers tease that Lulu Spencer (Emme Rylan) may come out of her coma if the news of Luke Spencer‚Äôs (Anthony Geary) death stirs her awake. Laura Collins or Tracy Quatermaine may have to offer updates to comatose Lulu about her deceased dad, but could that prompt a miracle?

During the week of January 3-7, Tracy Quartermaine (Jane Elliot) will return to Port Charles ‚Äì and she‚Äôll bring word of a terrible tragedy.

Thanks to Tracy hitting PC again, the whole town will face devastation. The show‚Äôs playing this up as a huge deal in spoilers, so it certainly looks like Luke was killed offscreen.

Of course, Luke‚Äôs death is going to affect so many characters in so many different ways.

Laura will no doubt think back on her history with Luke as Kevin Collins (John Lindstrom) pushes her to open up. Kevin will want to be there for Laura as she processes all this, but her mind should go to Lulu eventually.

Laura and Tracy might feel the need to pay Lulu a visit in her long-term care facility and deliver this tragic news. They may admit Luke died and cry by Lulu‚Äôs bedside over all the losses faced over the years.

It‚Äôd be a great story if Lulu responded to Laura and Tracy‚Äôs updates on Luke and finally opened her eyes.

Perhaps something good could come out of the tragedy if it managed to stir Lulu Spencer awake and helped her rejoin society. Luke‚Äôs end could help Lulu get a miraculous new beginning in that case.

It would soften the blow of losing Luke, especially since there‚Äôs been more than enough death and destruction on GH lately.

Many fans would like to see some positive developments and returns to go along with the crushing outcomes.

There‚Äôs surely a reason why the writers chose to keep Lulu alive rather than killing her off.

By putting Lulu in a coma, they made it inevitable that she would rise from it one day.

Whether that happens with Emme Rylan in the role or a recast takes over, Lulu Spencer‚Äôs return would be a welcome one.

General Hospital spoilers say some huge changes are ahead in Port Charles, so stay tuned to see how it all plays out!

CDL‚Äôs where you want to be for sizzling General Hospital spoilers, updates and news, so make us your one-stop source.

title: The Bold and the Beautiful Spoilers: Deacon Blamed for Switching Brooke‚Äôs Champagne ‚Äì Sheila Lets Former Friend Take Fall?
text:
The Bold and the Beautiful (B&B) spoilers tease that Deacon Sharpe (Sean Kanan) could get blamed for switching Brooke Forrester‚Äôs (Katherine Kelly Lang) Champagne, so will Sheila Carter (Kimberlin Brown) let her former friend take the fall?

B&B fans know Sheila was furious when Brooke threatened to destroy the progress she‚Äôs made with her family.

Brooke intends to do whatever it takes to keep Sheila away ‚Äì especially from Steffy Forrester (Jacqueline MacInnes Wood), John ‚ÄúFinn‚Äù Finnegan (Tanner Novlan) and Hayes Forrester Finnegan (Piper Harriot).

Brooke also shut down Sheila‚Äôs friendship with Deacon, who did nothing to stop it.

Deacon is too enamored by Brooke to go against her, so that gives Sheila a motive to turn against him as well.

Sheila carried out a twisted plan, which involved putting a nonalcoholic label on a bottle of real bubbly.

After Brooke‚Äôs wild New Year‚Äôs Eve with Deacon, she‚Äôs going to wake up with a horrible hangover and know something‚Äôs seriously wrong.

It won‚Äôt take Brooke long to figure out that she somehow wound up drinking actual Champagne.

Of course, Brooke won‚Äôt tell Ridge Forrester (Thorsten Kaye) the whole Deacon story and may not remember it all anyway!

However, Brooke will at least confess to Ridge that she drank and ruined her sobriety.

At some point, Ridge is probably going to examine the bottle and might discover it‚Äôs been tampered with. After mulling it over, Ridge may determine that someone seemingly wanted to trick Brooke.

Since Ridge likes to think the worst of Deacon, he may eventually assume Deacon was behind the switcheroo. Sheila might even find a way to plant some evidence and back up that idea.

Regardless, Sheila may act like she has an alibi since she was busy visiting Taylor Hayes‚Äô (Krista Allen) office.

B&B viewers know Sheila had plenty of time to make the switch, but Sheila may pretend she wasn‚Äôt anywhere near Il Giardino ‚Äì unlike Deacon who was working and made sure the delivery guy had the right bottle.

Bottom line, there‚Äôs the potential for the finger to be pointed at innocent Deacon.

Ridge may ultimately accuse Deacon of trying to get Brooke drunk enough to hit the sheets with him!

It‚Äôll look particularly bad for Deacon since he came back for his forgotten phone.

It might seem like he planned this whole disastrous night, so we‚Äôll see if Deacon ends up in hot water sooner or later.

The Bold and the Beautiful spoilers say Sheila has made a mess that‚Äôs only going to get worse, so stay tuned.

CDL‚Äôs where you want to be for terrific Bold and the Beautiful spoilers, news and updates, so drop by frequently.

title: General Hospital Spoilers: Sasha & Michael Reconnect ‚Äì Angry Heartache Pushes Exes Back Together?
text:
General Hospital (GH) spoilers tease that Sasha Gilmore (Sofia Mattsson) and Michael Corinthos (Chad Duell) may reconnect over some angry heartache. Will similar struggles push these exes back together?

Michael and Sasha were in love once upon a time, but Sasha and Harrison Chase‚Äôs (Josh Swickard) fake affair tore them apart.

It devastated Sasha to lose Michael, but she felt she had to make that sacrifice and give him a nudge toward a marriage with Willow Tait (Katelyn MacMullen).

Chase and Sasha knew that marriage would boost Michael‚Äôs chances against Nelle Benson (Chloe Lanier) in the custody battle over Wiley Quartermaine-Corinthos (Viron Weaver), so they did what they had to do.

Unfortunately, Sasha was never able to recapture what she lost with Michael once the truth came out.

Michael legitimately fell for Willow, but that doesn‚Äôt mean he‚Äôs forgotten what he once felt for Sasha.

There‚Äôs the potential for Sasha and Michael‚Äôs romance to come back around now that they‚Äôre facing new challenges in their current relationships.

Michael has turned into a raging, bitter version of himself that‚Äôs hard to even recognize. However, there‚Äôs pain underneath that anger.

Michael lost so much time with Sonny Corinthos (Maurice Benard) and felt the devastating blow of losing his dad. can‚Äôt forgive Nina Reeves (Cynthia Watros) for that and doesn‚Äôt like the fact that Sonny‚Äôs being so protective of her.

Although Michael didn‚Äôt really blame Willow for keeping Nina‚Äôs secret, there‚Äôs no denying that she did keep it under wraps ‚Äì and that matters.

Willow chose to listen to Nina instead of coming clean with Michael, so GH writers are going to worsen the trust issues between them.

This will build on the conflict that was already there since Willow doesn‚Äôt like this vengeful side of Michael.

Although Willow understands Michael‚Äôs frustration, she doesn‚Äôt want him going too far in his quest for revenge.

Willow is never going to be in Michael‚Äôs shoes and won‚Äôt understand the depth of what he‚Äôs feeling.

Sasha will be in a similar boat since she won‚Äôt think Brando Corbin (Johnny Wactor) understands her either.

Sasha‚Äôs dealing with the loss of Liam Corbin and no doubt wondering why he was taken from her so soon.

The details of Sasha‚Äôs situation may be different, but the gist is the same ‚Äì a tough mix of emotions including pain and anger plus a partner who just doesn‚Äôt quite get it.

It‚Äôs easy to see how Michael and Sasha could reunite over all that sooner or later.

That‚Äôs especially true since we know Michael‚Äôs relationship is about to head downhill fast ‚Äì and Sasha seems poised to push Brando away eventually, too.

There‚Äôll be a disconnect for both couples, so that could bring a Michael and Sasha reunion down the road.

General Hospital spoilers say Sasha and Michael have some tough times ahead of them, so stay tuned to see if they‚Äôll lean on each other again.
